characterabilities.name: Alchemical Mask
characterabilities.description: This model does not suffer gas effects. When determining LOS or resolving attacks, this model ignores cloud effects and concealment granted from cloud effects.

characterabilities.name: Paid Loyalties [Ord] [Crucible Guard]
characterabilities.description: When included in a Ord army, Syvestro 1 is a Ord model and not a Crucible Guard model. When included in a Crucible Guard army, Syvestro 1 is a Crucible Guard model and not a Ord model.

feat.name: Meta Principle
feat.description: While in Aurum Adeptus Syvestro's Control Range, friendly Faction models gain an additional die on accuracy and damage rolls. Discard one die of your choice in each roll. Additionally, when an enemy model is destroyed while in Syvestro's control range, a friendly Faction model in Syvestro's control range can remove d3 damage points. Meta Principle lasts for one turn.

execution.name: Veteran Leader [Alchemist]
execution.description: While in this model's CMD range, Alchemist models gain +1 to attack accuracy rolls.

topability.name: Field Alchemy
topability.description: This model can use one of the following special rules at any time during each of it's activations.

subabilities.name: Ephemeral Vitae
subabilities.description: This model can cast one spell this activation without spending focus points.

subabilities.name: Impenetrable Haze
subabilities.description: Center a 4” AOE cloud effect on this model. The AOE remains in play for one round. While this model is completely within the AOE, This model gains stealth.

subabilities.name: Super Fuel
subabilities.description: Friendly Faction construct models currently within 5” of this model gain +2 SPD this turn.

ability.name: Decrepitation
ability.description: This weapon gains an additional die on damage rolls against construct and undead models.

spells.name: Admonition
spells.description: When an enemy model advances and ends its movement or is warped within 6" of target model in this spellcaster's battlegroup, the affected model can immediately advance up to 3", then Admonition expires.

spells.name: Ignite
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains +2 to melee attack damage rolls. Affected models gain Critical Fire on their melee attacks.

spells.name: Purification
spells.description: Continuous effect, animi and upkeep spells in the spellcaster's Control Range immediately expire.

spells.name: Revive
spells.description: Return one destroyed Grunt to a friendly Faction unit with one unmarked damage box. Place the returned Grunt in the spellcaster's Control Range, in formation, and completely within 3" of another model in its unit. The Grunt must forfeit its Combat Action the turn it is put into play.

spells.name: Stygian Abyss
spells.description: A model damaged by Stygian Abyss suffers blind for one round. (A model suffering Blind cannot make ranged or magic attacks, suffers -4 MAT and DEF, and cannot run, charge, grab, throw or make slam or trample power attacks. It must forfeit either its Normal Movement or Combat Action during its next activation. Blind can be shaken.).

spells.name: Transmutation
spells.description: When Transmutation targets an enemy model/unit, it is an offensive spell and requires a magic attack roll. When Transmutation affects a friendly model/unit, affected models gain +2 STR and DEF and gain pathfinder. When Transmutation affects an enemy model/unit, affected models suffer -2 STR and DEF and lose pathfinder.

characterabilities.name: Detox (★Action)
characterabilities.description: Remove any number of juice tokens from this model.

characterabilities.name: Health Care
characterabilities.description: This model does not suffer damage from Juicer while it has two or fewer juice tokens on it and is in Little Alyce's CMD range.

characterabilities.name: Heart of Darkness [Crucible Guard]
characterabilities.description: This model can be included in an Infernals army. If it is, it becomes an Infernal model and not a Crucible Guard model. If included in an Infernals army, any non-partisan, non-character Crucible Guard Cohort can also be included in this model's battlegroup and they gain Accumulator [Soulless].  Additionally, you may include 2 non-partisan, non-character Crucible Guard units and 3 non-partisan, non-Archon, non-character Crucible Guard Solos as well.

characterabilities.name: Irregulars [Alyce Marc]
characterabilities.description: Alyce Marc units can be included in any army that also includes Lukas 1.

characterabilities.name: Juicer
characterabilities.description: During your Maintenance Phase, you can place one juice token on di Morray. For each juice token on di Morray, he gains +1 ARC and AAT. At the end of each of his activations , roll a d6. If the result is equal to or less than the number of juice tokens on Di Morray, he suffers 1 damage point for each juice token on him. Di Morray cannot spend focus to reduce this damage.

characterabilities.name: Rapid Healing
characterabilities.description: When this model is damaged by an enemy attack, immediately after the attack is resolved remove d3 damage points from it.

characterabilities.name: Split Loyalties [Llael] [Crucible Guard]
characterabilities.description: When included in a Llael army, Lukas 1 is a Llael model and not a Crucible Guard model. When included in a Crucible Guard army, Lukas 1 is a Crucible Guard model and not a Llael model.

feat.name: Juiced Up
feat.description: Di Morray immediately gains one juice token and 1 focus point, then warjacks in his battlegroup currently in his control range gain 1 focus point. Additionally, di Morra gains Range Amplifier this activation. (When a model with Range Amplifier casts a spell and is the point of origin for the spell, the spell gains +5 RNG)

execution.name: Quick Work
execution.description: When this model destroys one or more enemy models with a melee attack during it's Combat Action, immediately after the attack is resolved, it can make one basic ranged attack.

ability.name: Exothermic Reaction
ability.description: When this attack boxes a living or undead model, center a 4" AOE on the boxed model, then remove the model from play. Models in the AOE are hit and suffer an unboostable POW 12 fire damage roll and suffer the Continuous Fire effect. This damage is not considered to have been caused by an attack. This model is not affected by Exothermic Reaction.

spells.name: Burning Ash
spells.description: Place a 3" AOE cloud effect anywhere completely within the spellcaster's Control Range. While in the AOE, living enemy models without Resistance: Fire suffers -2 to attack rolls. The AOE remains in play for one round.

spells.name: Disintegration
spells.description: The model hit suffers -2 ARM for one round. A model boxed by Disintegration is removed from play.

spells.name: Force Hammer
spells.description: Instead of suffering a normal damage roll, a non-Incorporeal model Force Hammer hits is slammed d6" directly away from the spell's point of origin and suffers a POW 12 damage roll. Collateral damage from this slam is POW 12.

spells.name: Iron Flesh
spells.description: Target friendly Faction warrior model/unit gains +2 ARM and Blast Resistance. Models are not affected while out of formation. (A model with Blast Resistance suffers one fewer die from blast damage rolls.).

spells.name: Telekinesis
spells.description: Warp target model completely within 2" of its current location. When Telekinesis targets an enemy model, it is an offensive spell and requires a magic attack roll. A model can be warped by telekinesis only once per turn.

models.name: Locke 1
models.title: Crucible Guard, Convergence of Cyriss Warcaster

characterabilities.name: Field Marshal [True Strike]
characterabilities.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain True Strike. (When this model damages a warjack or warbeast with a melee attack, choose which column or branch suffers the damage.)

characterabilities.name: Living Convergence
characterabilities.description: This model is a living model.

characterabilities.name: Paid Loyalties [Crucible Guard] [Convergence]
characterabilities.description: When included in a Crucible Guard army, Locke 1 is a Crucible Guard model and not a Convergence model. When included in a Convergence army, Locke 1 is a Convergence model and not a Crucible Guard model.

characterabilities.name: Repair [d3+3] (★Action)
characterabilities.description: RNG 1". Target friendly Faction construct model. If the model is in range, remove d3+3 damage point from it.

characterabilities.name: Resourceful
characterabilities.description: This model can upkeep spells on models in it's battlegroup without spending focus or fury.

characterabilities.name: Split Loyalties [Ord] [Crucible Guard]
characterabilities.description: When included in a Ord army, Locke 1 is a Ord model and not a Crucible Guard model. When included in a Crucible Guard army, Locke 1 is a Crucible Guard model and not a Ord model.

feat.name: Arcanodynamic Catalysis
feat.description: Enemy upkeep spells and animi in Locke’s Control range immediately expire. For one round, when an enemy model is forced, casts a spell, or spends 1 or more essence, focus or fury points while in Locke’s control range, you can place one catalytic token on a model in Locke’s battlegroup currently in her control range. If a model casts a spell by spending essence, focus or fury, Arcanodynamic Catalysis triggers only once. A model cannot have more than three catalytic tokens on it at any time. A model gains +1 DEF and +1 ARM for each catalytic token on it. The weapons of a model with one or more catalytic tokens gain Damage Type: Arcane. Remove one catalytic token from each affected model at the end of its activation.

execution.name: Field Marshal [Cutting Edge]
execution.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Cutting Edge. (When a warjack with Cutting Edge is allocated 1 or more focus points while within its controller’s command range, it is allocated 1 additional focus point. )

ability.name: Critical Knockdown
ability.description: On a critical hit, the model hit becomes knocked down.

spells.name: Bombshell
spells.description: On a critical hit, models hit are thrown d6" directly away from the attacker. Roll distance once for all models affected. Models thrown do not deviate. Move models farthest from the attacker first. Instead of suffering blast damage, models hit but not directly hit suffer a POW 10 damage roll. The POW of collateral damage is 10.

spells.name: Engine Of Destruction
spells.description: The Spellcaster gains +2 SPD, +4 MAT and +4 to melee attack damage rolls for one turn.

spells.name: Jackhammer
spells.description: Target model in the spellcaster's battlegroup immediately makes one basic melee attack.

spells.name: Redline
spells.description: Target warjack in the spellcaster's battlegroup gains +2 SPD and +2 to melee attack damage rolls and can run, charge, or make slam or trample power attacks without spending focus. At the end of each of its activations, the affected warjack suffers d3 damage points.

spells.name: Road To War
spells.description: When a friendly Faction model in the spellcaster's Control Range destroys one or more enemy models with a melee or ranged attack during its activation, immediately after the attack is resolved one warjack in the spellcaster's battlegroup that is in its Control Range can advance up to 3". A warjack can advance as a result of Road to War only once per turn.

spells.name: Sentry
spells.description: Target friendly Faction gains Rapid Fire. (A model with Rapid Fire can make one basic ranged attack during your Maintenance Phase.).

characterabilities.name: Bulldoze
characterabilities.description: When this model is B2B with an enemy model during it's Normal Movement, it can push that model up to 2" directly away from it. A model can be pushed by Bulldoze only once per turn. Bulldoze has no effect when this model makes a trample power attack.

characterabilities.name: Elite Cadre [Railless Interceptor] [Steel Cavalry]
characterabilities.description: Friendly Railless Interceptor models gain Steel Cavalry.

characterabilities.name: Exhaust Fumes
characterabilities.description: When this model advances during it's Normal Movement, for one round other friendly models gain concealment while within 3" of this model.

characterabilities.name: Paid Loyalties [Ord] [Crucible Guard]
characterabilities.description: When included in a Ord army, MacKay 1 is a Ord model and not a Crucible Guard model. When included in a Crucible Guard army, MacKay 1 is a Crucible Guard model and not a Ord model.

characterabilities.name: Reposition [3"]
characterabilities.description: At the end of an activation in which it did not run or fail a charge, this model can advance up to 3", then it's activation ends.

characterabilities.name: Steel Cavalry
characterabilities.description: This model counts as a cavalry model, but does not gain a Mount attack. When it makes an impact attack, that attack has a base POW equal to this model's STR. The melee range of impact attacks is 1".

feat.name: Overwhelming Force
feat.description: Friendly Faction models currently in MacKay's control range gain Run & Gun and their weapons gain Damage Type: Arcane. Additionally, when a friendly Faction construct model makes a damage roll against an enemy model with MacKay's control range, the damage roll is boosted. Overwhelming Force lasts for one turn. (At the end of it's activation, if it destroyed one or more enemy models with ranged attacks that activation, a model with Run & Gun can make a full advance.

execution.name: Carapace
execution.description: This model gains +4 ARM against ranged attack damage rolls.

topability.name: Attack Type
topability.description: Each time this weapon is used to make an attack, choose one of the following special rules:

subabilities.name: Psychomorphic Destabilizer
subabilities.description: This attack causes magical damage . Models hit by this attack lose incorporeal for one round.

subabilities.name: Pyro Blossom
subabilities.description: This attack causes Fire damage and gains Flare.

subabilities.name: Scather
subabilities.description: This attack's AOE is a hazard that remains in play for one round. Models without Resistance: Corrosion entering or ending their activations in the AOE suffer 1 point of corrosion damage.

ability.name: Ram
ability.description: When an enemy model is hit by this weapon during this model's Combat Action, it becomes knocked down and can be pushed 1" directly away from this model. If the model hit is pushed, this model can immediately advance 1" directly toward it.

spells.name: Fail-Safe
spells.description: Target warjack in the spellcaster’s battlegroup gains +2 ARM and does not suffer the effects of crippled systems.

spells.name: Jumpstart
spells.description: Models in the spellcaster's battlegroup that are currently in its Control Range stand up and are no longer stationary.  Affected models can turn to face any direction. Models that were knocked down this turn are not affected by Jumpstart.

spells.name: Mobility
spells.description: Models in the spellcaster's battlegroup currently in its Control Range gain +2 SPD and Pathfinder for one turn.

spells.name: Return Fire
spells.description: When target friendly Faction model is targeted by an enemy ranged attack, after the attack is resolved the affected model can make one basic melee or ranged attack, then Return fire expires. Return Fire lasts for one Round.

characterabilities.name: Dodge
characterabilities.description: This model can advance up to 2" immediately after an enemy attack that missed it is resolved unless it was missed while advancing. It cannot be targeted by free strikes during this movement.

characterabilities.name: Elite Cadre [Rocketmen] [Dogfighter]
characterabilities.description: Friendly Rocketmen models gain Dogfighter. (A model with Dogfighter gains boosted accuracy and damage rolls against other models with Flight.)

characterabilities.name: Flying High
characterabilities.description: Ranged attacks targeting this model with a RNG greater than 8 suffers -3 RNG to a minimum of 8. Friendly models can advance through this model if they have enough movement to move completely past its base. This model loses Flying High if it loses Flight.

characterabilities.name: Reposition [5"]
characterabilities.description: At the end of an activation in which it did not run or fail a charge, this model can advance up to 5", then it's activation ends.

feat.name: Air Support
feat.description: Put a unit of Crucible Guard Rocketmen (one Leader and five Grunts) and a Rocketman Ace into play. Place each model completely within 3" of Bennet.

execution.name: Blend In [Rocketmen]
execution.description: This model cannot be targeted by attacks, charges, or slam power attacks while there is one or more other friendly Rocketmen models within 3" of it.

ability.name: Both Barrels (★Attack)
ability.description: This model gains +4 to the damage roll for this attack. This model cannot make additional ranged attacks with this weapon during an activation in which it makes a Both Barrels Attack.

spells.name: Arcane Propulsion
spells.description: Target non-huge based warjack in the spellcaster's battlegroup gains +2" movement when advancing as part of their Normal Movement, +2 DEF and Flight.

spells.name: Down Range
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains +2 to ranged damage rolls.

spells.name: Occultation
spells.description: Target friendly Faction Model/Unit gains Stealth. Models are not affected while out of formation.

spells.name: Raid
spells.description: Friendly Faction warrior models with Gunfighter beginning a charge in the spellcaster's Control Range gain +2" movement and Pistoleer. Raid lasts for one turn. (Range attack damage rolls made by a model with Pistoleer against a model in melee with it are boosted.).

spells.name: Wind Burst
spells.description: Cloud effects overlapping the AOE expire.

spells.name: Windstorm
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's control range, enemy models' range weapons with a RNG greater than 8” suffer -5 RNG on affected ranged attacks to a minimum of 8”. When an enemy AOE ranged attack deviates from a point in this model's control range, after determining the deviation distance, you choose the deviation direction. Additionally, while in the spellcaster's Control Range friendly models gain Blast Resistance.Windstorm lasts for one round.

characterabilities.name: Alchemical Mask
characterabilities.description: This model does not suffer gas effects. When determining LOS or resolving attacks, this model ignores cloud effects and concealment granted from cloud effects.

characterabilities.name: Arms Caddy
characterabilities.description: Once per turn at any time during its activation and while within 5" of Mr. Clogg, Gearhart can use Arms Caddy. Replace his ranged weapon with one of the weapons on Mr. Clogg's card. Gearhart keeps that weapon until he uses Arms Caddy again.

characterabilities.name: Paid Loyalties [Cygnar] [Crucible Guard]
characterabilities.description: When included in a Cygnar army, Marshal General Baldwin Gearhart is a Cygnar model and not a Crucible Guard model. When included in a Crucible Guard army, Marshal General Baldwin Gearhart is a Crucible Guard model and not a Cygnar model.

characterabilities.name: Veteran Leader [Faction warrior]
characterabilities.description: While in this model's CMD range, Faction warrior models gain +1 to attack accuracy rolls.

feat.name: Fox Hunt
feat.description: Choose an enemy model/unit in Gearhart’s control range. Friendly Faction models gain Prey against the chosen model/unit. A model gains +2 to accuracy and damage rolls against its prey. When the prey is destroyed or removed from play, choose another model/unit in Gearhart’s control range to be the prey. Fox Hunt lasts for one turn.

execution.name: Prowl
execution.description: While this model has concealment, it gains Stealth.

topability.name: Battle Plan
topability.description: This model can use one of the following plans at any time during its activation. A friendly Faction model/unit can be affected by only one plan each turn.

subabilities.name: Bloody Well Done!
subabilities.description: RNG 5. Target friendly Faction warrior model/unit. If the model/unit is in range, it gains an additional die on each model’s first non-spray range attack roll this turn.

subabilities.name: Give 'Em What For!
subabilities.description: RNG 5. Target friendly Faction warrior model. If the model is in range, it gains Reciprocate for one round. (When a model with Reciprocate is missed by an enemy ranged attack, immediately after the attack is resolved it can make one basic ranged attack against the attacking model.

subabilities.name: Operations Command
subabilities.description: While in this model's CMD range, friendly Faction warrior models can ignore other friendly Faction warrior models when determining LOS. Friendly Faction warrior models can advance through other friendly Faction warrior models in this model's CMD range if they have enough movement to move completely past them.

ability.name: Arcing Fire
ability.description: When attacking with this weapon, this model can ignore intervening models except those within 1" of the target.

ability.name: Mechanikal Seizure
ability.description: When a warjack is hit by this weapon, it becomes Stationary for one round.

spells.name: Boundless Charge
spells.description: During it's activation, target friendly faction model can charge without spending focus or being forced and gains +2 SPD and Pathfinder when it charges. Boundless Charge lasts for one turn.

spells.name: Deceleration
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's Control Range, friendly faction models gain +2 ARM against ranged and magic attack damage rolls. Deceleration lasts for one round.

spells.name: Hot Shot
spells.description: Target model in the spellcaster's battlegroup gains boosted ranged attack damage rolls.

spells.name: Snipe
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model's/unit's non spray ranged weapons gain +4 RNG.

characterabilities.name: Companion [Marshal General Baldwin Gearhart]
characterabilities.description: This model is included in any army that includes Marshal General Baldwin Gearhart. If Marshal General Baldwin Gearhart is destroyed or removed from play, remove this model from play. This model is part of Marshal General Baldwin Gearhart's battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Hit The Deck!
characterabilities.description: Ignore this model when determining which models would be hit by an AOE. If it would be hit by an AOE, it instead becomes knocked down. While this model is knocked down, ranged attacks targeting it automatically miss.

characterabilities.name: Johnny On The Spot (★Action)
characterabilities.description: RNG 5. Target Gearhart. If Gearhart is in range, he immediately makes one basic melee or ranged attack.

characterabilities.name: Non-Combatant
characterabilities.description: This model cannot make attacks.

ability.name: Arcing Fire
ability.description: When attacking with this weapon, this model can ignore intervening models except those within 1" of the target.

ability.name: Momentum
ability.description: A small or medium-based model directly hit by this attack is slammed d3" directly away from this model. The POW of collateral damage is equal to the POW of this weapon. In addition to suffering a normal damage roll, large-based models hit by this attack become knocked down.

ability.name: Critical Freeze
ability.description: On a critical hit, the model hit becomes stationary for one round unless it has Resistance: Cold.

ability.name: Shadow Bind
ability.description: A model hit by this weapon suffers Shadow Bind for one round. (A model suffering shadow Bind suffers -3 DEF, and for one round when it advances it cannot move except to change facing. Shadow Bind can be shaken.)

ability.name: Burst Fire
ability.description: Gain +1 to damage rolls with this weapon against medium-based models, and +2 to damage rolls against large- extra large- and huge-based models.

characterabilities.name: Ashen Veil
characterabilities.description: This model has concealment. Living enemy models without Resistance: Fire suffer -2 to attack accuracy rolls while within 2" of this model.

characterabilities.name: Cutting Edge
characterabilities.description: When a warjack with Cutting Edge is allocated 1 or more focus points while within its controller’s CMD range, it is allocated 1 additional focus point.

characterabilities.name: Experimental Arc Node
characterabilities.description: This model's controller can channel spells through it even if it is engaged, however if it does, it suffers 1 point of damage to its first available Arc Node system box.

characterabilities.name: Imprint [Overclocking]
characterabilities.description: This model can spend 1 focus point at any time during its activation to gain Overclocking. (A model with Overclocking gains +2 STR and gains Rapid Strike until th end of the turn. (A model with Rapid Strike can make one additional melee attack each Combat Action.))

characterabilities.name: Avenging Force
characterabilities.description: If one or more friendly warrior models were destroyed or removed from play by enemy attacks while within 5" of this model during your opponent's last turn, during your Maintenance Phase this model can advance 3" and make one basic ranged or melee attack.

characterabilities.name: Cutting Edge
characterabilities.description: When a warjack with Cutting Edge is allocated 1 or more focus points while within its controller’s CMD range, it is allocated 1 additional focus point.

topability.name: Attack Type
topability.description: Each time this weapon is used to make an attack, choose one of the following special rules:

subabilities.name: Accelerant
subabilities.description: A model hit by this attack suffers oil for one round. (When a model affected by Oil suffers a fire damage roll, the roll is automatically boosted.)

subabilities.name: Aetheric Blast
subabilities.description: On a critical hit, the model hit becomes knocked down. Cloud effects overlapping the spray template expire.

subabilities.name: Black Humor
subabilities.description: This weapon gains Continuous Effect: Corrosion and Grevious Wounds for this attack.

characterabilities.name: Cutting Edge
characterabilities.description: When a warjack with Cutting Edge is allocated 1 or more focus points while within its controller’s CMD range, it is allocated 1 additional focus point.

characterabilities.name: Shooting Gallery
characterabilities.description: This model gains +2 to Ranged accuracy rolls against models within 5” of it.

topability.name: Attack Type
topability.description: Each time this weapon is used to make an attack, choose one of the following special rules:

subabilities.name: Ice Cage
subabilities.description: This attack causes no damage. Instead, a model hit suffers a cumulative -2 DEF for one turn unless it has Resistance: Cold. When a model without Resistance: Cold is hit with three or more Ice Cage attacks the same turn, it becomes stationary for one round.

subabilities.name: Incendiary
subabilities.description: This attack causes fire damage, and models suffer the Fire continuous effect.

subabilities.name: Rust
subabilities.description: Construct models hit suffer -2 ARM for one turn.

topability.name: Attack Type
topability.description: Each time this weapon is used to make an attack, choose one of the following special rules:

subabilities.name: Ice Cage
subabilities.description: This attack causes no damage. Instead, a model hit suffers a cumulative -2 DEF for one turn unless it has Resistance: Cold. When a model without Resistance: Cold is hit with three or more Ice Cage attacks the same turn, it becomes stationary for one round.

subabilities.name: Incendiary
subabilities.description: This attack causes fire damage, and models suffer the Fire continuous effect.

subabilities.name: Rust
subabilities.description: Construct models hit suffer -2 ARM for one turn.

characterabilities.name: Cutting Edge
characterabilities.description: When a warjack with Cutting Edge is allocated 1 or more focus points while within its controller’s CMD range, it is allocated 1 additional focus point.

ability.name: Powerful Attack
ability.description: When attacking with this weapon, this model can spend 1 focus point to boost all attack accuracy and damage rolls for the attack.

ability.name: Steam Pressure
ability.description: If this model uses it's Normal Movement to aim, this weapon gains +4 RNG that activation.

topability.name: Attack Type
topability.description: Each time this weapon is used to make an attack, choose one of the following special rules:

subabilities.name: Decrepitation
subabilities.description: This weapon gains an additional die on damage rolls against construct and undead models.

subabilities.name: Psychoactive Gas
subabilities.description: A living warbeast directly hit by this attack gains 1 fury point unless they can ignore gas effects.

subabilities.name: Psychomorphic Destabilizer
subabilities.description: This attack causes magical damage . Models hit by this attack lose incorporeal for one round.

subabilities.name: Withering Humor
subabilities.description: Living and undead models hit by this attack suffer -2 ARM and lose Tough for one turn unless they can ignore gas effects.

characterabilities.name: Bulldoze
characterabilities.description: When this model is B2B with an enemy model during it's Normal Movement, it can push that model up to 2" directly away from it. A model can be pushed by Bulldoze only once per turn. Bulldoze has no effect when this model makes a trample power attack.

topability.name: Alchemical Vents
topability.description: At the beginning of this model’s activation, choose one of the following Alchemical Vents effects. While within 5” of this model, models are affected by the chosen effect. While its S system is crippled, this model loses the benefits of Alchemical Vents. Alchemical Vent effects last for one round

subabilities.name: Iron Bane
subabilities.description: Affected enemy construct models suffer Rust. A construct suffering Rust suffers -2 ARM.

subabilities.name: Miasma of Death
subabilities.description: Affected living enemy models lose Tough and cannot have damage removed from them unless they can ignore gas effects.

subabilities.name: Unnatural Affliction
subabilities.description: Affected enemy models lose Resistance: Cold, Resistance: Corrosion, Resistance: Electricity, Resistance: Fire, Resistance: Blast, and Resistance: Arcane.

ability.name: ChemTrail
ability.description: The AOE remains in play for one round. While in the AOE, models are affected by the chosen Alchemical Vents effect. While the S system is disabled, this model loses the benefits of ChemTrail.

ability.name: Minimum Range [5"]
ability.description: Attacks made with this weapon cannot target models within 5" of this model.

ability.name: Primary Weapon
ability.description: This model can make attacks with this weapon only during its Combat Action.

ability.name: Reload [1]
ability.description: This model can spend up to 1 focus, fury, or essensce to make one additional ranged attack with this weapon during its Combat Action per focus, fury, or essence spent.

characterabilities.name: Girded
characterabilities.description: This model and models B2B with it gain Blast Resistance. (A model with Blast Resistance suffers one fewer die from blast damage rolls.)

characterabilities.name: Steady
characterabilities.description: This model cannot become knocked down.

topability.name: Battle Wizard
topability.description: Once per turn, when this model destroys one or more enemy models with a melee attack during its activation, immediately after the attack is resolved it can make one Magic ability special attack or special action.

subabilities.name: Force Aura (★Action)
subabilities.description: While within 3”of the spellcaster, friendly Faction models gain +2 DEF and ARM against ranged attacks. Force Aura lasts for one round.

subabilities.name: Psychic Assault (★Attack)
subabilities.description: Psychic Assault is a RNG SP 8, POW 12 magic attack. This attack ignores LOS.

subabilities.name: Psychokinetic Shield (★Action)
subabilities.description: While within 5” of the spellcaster, enemy models suffer -2 MAT and RAT and cannot run, charge, or make slam or trample power attacks.

ability.name: Critical Knockdown
ability.description: On a critical hit, the model hit becomes knocked down.

characterabilities.name: Alchemical Mask
characterabilities.description: This model does not suffer gas effects. When determining LOS or resolving attacks, this model ignores cloud effects and concealment granted from cloud effects.

characterabilities.name: All-Terrain (★Action)
characterabilities.description: RNG 1”. Target friendly Faction construct model. If the model is in range, it gains Pathfinder for one turn.

characterabilities.name: Empower (★Action)
characterabilities.description: RNG CMD. Target friendly Faction warjack. If the target warjack is in the range and it was suffering Disruption, it is no longer disrupted. The warjack also gains 1 focus point.

characterabilities.name: Garrison Troops
characterabilities.description: This model can be included in an Ord or Llael army and are considered in faction.

characterabilities.name: Repair [D3+1] (★Action)
characterabilities.description: RNG 1". Target friendly Faction construct model. If the model is in range, remove D3+1 damage point from it.

characterabilities.name: Field Marshal [Dispel]
characterabilities.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Dispel. (When a weapon with Dispel hits a model/unit, upkeep spells and animi on that model/unit immediately expire.)

characterabilities.name: Journeyman Warcaster
characterabilities.description: This model is not a warcaster or Leader, but has the following warcaster special rules: Battlegroup Controller, Focus Manipulation, Power Field, and Spellcaster. This model must have at least one warjack in its battlegroup at the start of the game.

characterabilities.name: Soul Vessel
characterabilities.description: This model generates soul tokens as if it were a living model.

characterabilities.name: Veteran Leader [Warjack]
characterabilities.description: While in this model's CMD range, Warjack models gain +1 to attack accuracy rolls.

ability.name: Critical Knockdown
ability.description: On a critical hit, the model hit becomes knocked down.

spells.name: Guided Fire
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's Control Range, models in its battlegroup gain boosted Ranged Accuracy rolls for one turn.

spells.name: Instability Equation
spells.description: Target friendly warjack stands up, is no longer stationary, and can turn to face any direction. If the warjack was suffering Disruption, it is no longer disrupted. The warjack gains up to 3 focus points. The warjack gains Unstable for one turn. (Unstable - At the end of an activation in which this model spent more than 1 focus point, roll a d6. If the roll is equal to or less than the number of focus points spent, this model explodes and other models within 3" of it suffer an unboostable POW 14 blast damage roll. Remove this model from play.)

characterabilities.name: Alchemical Mask
characterabilities.description: This model does not suffer gas effects. When determining LOS or resolving attacks, this model ignores cloud effects and concealment granted from cloud effects.

characterabilities.name: Dodge
characterabilities.description: This model can advance up to 2" immediately after an enemy attack that missed it is resolved unless it was missed while advancing. It cannot be targeted by free strikes during this movement.

characterabilities.name: Dogfighter
characterabilities.description: This model gains boosted accuracy and damage rolls against other models with Flight.

characterabilities.name: Flying High
characterabilities.description: Ranged attacks targeting this model with a RNG greater than 8 suffers -3 RNG to a minimum of 8. Friendly models can advance through this model if they have enough movement to move completely past its base. This model loses Flying High if it loses Flight.

characterabilities.name: Garrison Troops
characterabilities.description: This model can be included in an Ord or Llael army and are considered in faction.

characterabilities.name: Reposition [5"]
characterabilities.description: At the end of an activation in which it did not run or fail a charge, this model can advance up to 5", then it's activation ends.

characterabilities.name: Swift Hunter
characterabilities.description: When this model destroys one or more enemy models with a basic ranged attack, immediately after the attack is resolved it can advance up to 2".

ability.name: Brutal Damage
ability.description: On a direct hit, gain an additional die on this weapon's damage roll against the target directly hit.

ability.name: Sky-Dropped
ability.description: Attacks with this weapon ignore cover. Models with Flight do not suffer blast damage from this attack.

characterabilities.name: Alchemical Mask
characterabilities.description: This model does not suffer gas effects. When determining LOS or resolving attacks, this model ignores cloud effects and concealment granted from cloud effects.

characterabilities.name: Flying High
characterabilities.description: Ranged attacks targeting this model with a RNG greater than 8 suffers -3 RNG to a minimum of 8. Friendly models can advance through this model if they have enough movement to move completely past its base. This model loses Flying High if it loses Flight.

characterabilities.name: Garrison Troops
characterabilities.description: This model can be included in an Ord or Llael army and are considered in faction.

characterabilities.name: Reposition [5"]
characterabilities.description: At the end of an activation in which it did not run or fail a charge, this model can advance up to 5", then it's activation ends.

characterabilities.name: Side Step
characterabilities.description: When this model hits an enemy model with an initial melee attack or a melee special attack, it can advance up to 2" after the attack is resolved.

ability.name: Puncture
ability.description: On a direct hit, all models hit automatically suffer 1 damage point.

topability.name: Attack Type
topability.description: Each time this weapon is used to make an attack, choose one of the following special rules:

subabilities.name: Blind
subabilities.description: When a model is hit by an attack with this weapon, it suffers Blind for one round. (A model suffering Blind cannot make range or magic attacks, suffers -4 MAT and DEF, and cannot run, charge, or make slam or trample power attacks. It must forfeit either its Normal Movement or Combat Action during its next activation. Blind can be shaken.)

subabilities.name: Shadow Bind
subabilities.description: A model hit by this weapon suffers Shadow Bind for one round. (A model suffering shadow Bind suffers -3 DEF, and for one round when it advances it cannot move except to change facing. Shadow Bind can be shaken.)

subabilities.name: Volatile Expansion
subabilities.description: When a living or undead model is boxed by an attack made with this weapon, center a 4˝ AOE on the boxed model and then remove the model from play. Models in the AOE are hit and suffer a POW 14 magical blast damage roll.

characterabilities.name: Force Barrier
characterabilities.description: This model gains +2 DEF against ranged accuracy attack rolls and Resistance: Blast.

characterabilities.name: Mental Force
characterabilities.description: This model can use Mental Force at the beginning of each attack. If it does, all attack and damage rolls resulting from the attack are boosted. After the attack is resolved, this model suffers d3 damage points.

characterabilities.name: Poltergeist
characterabilities.description: When an enemy model misses this model with an attack, immediately after the attack is resolved you can choose to push the enemy model d3" directly away from this model.

characterabilities.name: Psychokinetic Blast
characterabilities.description: When this model is disabled, center a 4" AOE on it. Models in the AOE suffer a POW 12 blast damage roll. Enemy models in the AOE are pushed 2" directly away from this model in the order you choose. After these pushes are resolved, RFP this model.

characterabilities.name: Steady
characterabilities.description: This model cannot become knocked down.

ability.name: Smite (★Attack)
ability.description: On a critical hit, the model hit can be slammed d6" directly away from this model. If the model hit has a larger base than the attacking model, it is moved only half the distance rolled. The POW of collateral damage is equal to the STR of this model.

characterabilities.name: Alchemical Mask
characterabilities.description: This model does not suffer gas effects. When determining LOS or resolving attacks, this model ignores cloud effects and concealment granted from cloud effects.

characterabilities.name: Garrison Troops
characterabilities.description: This model can be included in an Ord or Llael army and are considered in faction.

characterabilities.name: Prowl
characterabilities.description: While this model has concealment, it gains Stealth.

characterabilities.name: Reposition [3"]
characterabilities.description: At the end of an activation in which it did not run or fail a charge, this model can advance up to 3", then it's activation ends.

characterabilities.name: Smoke Bomb
characterabilities.description: Centre a 3" AOE cloud effect on this model. This AOE remains in play for one round.

ability.name: Pitching Arm
ability.description: Apply any modifiers to this model's STR to the RNG of this weapon.

topability.name: Attack Type
topability.description: Each time this weapon is used to make an attack, choose one of the following special rules:

subabilities.name: Acid Wash
subabilities.description: This attack causes corrosion damage. Models hit by this attack suffer the Corrosion continuous effect unless it has Resistance: Corrosion.

subabilities.name: Hull Tincture
subabilities.description: This attack causes no damage. Instead, remove d3 damage from each friendly Faction construct model hit. Continuous effects on those models immediately expire.

subabilities.name: Pyrocatalyst
subabilities.description: This attack causes fire damage. Models hit by this attack suffer the Fire continuous effect unless it has Resistance: Fire

characterabilities.description: While this model has concealment, it gains Stealth.

ability.name: Arcing Fire
ability.description: When attacking with this weapon, this model can ignore intervening models except those within 1" of the target.

topability.name: Attack Type
topability.description: Each time this weapon is used to make an attack, choose one of the following special rules:

subabilities.name: Blood of Urcaen
subabilities.description: This attack causes arcane damage. On a critical hit, upkeep spells and animi on the model/unit hit immediately expire.

subabilities.name: Targeting Flare
subabilities.description: Instead of making an attack with this weapon, you can place a 3" AOE anywhere completely within 14" of this model, with a center point in this model's LOS, ignoring intervening models. While a model is within the AOE, it loses Stealth and models can ignore cloud effects when determining LOS to it. The AOE remains in play for one turn.

subabilities.name: Weaponized Psychotropic
subabilities.description: Enemy warrior models hit by this attack have their LOS reduced to 5” for one round.

characterabilities.name: Alchemical Mask
characterabilities.description: This model does not suffer gas effects. When determining LOS or resolving attacks, this model ignores cloud effects and concealment granted from cloud effects.

characterabilities.name: Ashen Veil
characterabilities.description: This model has concealment. Living enemy models without Resistance: Fire suffer -2 to attack accuracy rolls while within 2" of this model.

characterabilities.name: Carapace
characterabilities.description: This model gains +4 ARM against ranged attack damage rolls.

characterabilities.name: Rapid Strike
characterabilities.description: This model can make one additional melee attack each Combat Action.

characterabilities.name: Repairable
characterabilities.description: This model can be targeted with Repair special actions as if it were a construct model.

ability.name: Eruption Of Ash
ability.description: If a model is boxed by an attack made with this weapon, center a 3" AOE cloud effect on the boxed model and then remove that model from play. The AOE is a hazard that remains in play for one round. Enemy models in the AOE when it was put in play are hit and suffer a POW 12 fire damage roll. Enemy models entering or ending their activations in the AOE suffer a POW 12 fire damage roll. Eruption of Ash damage rolls cannot be boosted.

characterabilities.name: Alchemical Mask
characterabilities.description: This model does not suffer gas effects. When determining LOS or resolving attacks, this model ignores cloud effects and concealment granted from cloud effects.

subabilities.name: Pyrocatalyst

subabilities.name: Spontaneous Combustion

characterabilities.name: Order: Strafing Run
characterabilities.description: Affected models gain +2 SPD and Reposition [5"] this turn. (At the end of an activation in which it did not run or fail a charge, a model with Reposition [5"] can advance up to 5", then its activation ends.)

ability.name: Cumbersome
ability.description: This model cannot make initial attacks with this weapon and another weapon on the same activation

ability.name: Sky-Dropped
ability.description: Attacks with this weapon ignore cover. Models with Flight do not suffer blast damage from this attack.

ability.name: High-Explosive
ability.description: Blast damage caused by this weapon is POW 10.

ability.name: Steam Pressure
ability.description: If this model uses it's Normal Movement to aim, this weapon gains +4 RNG that activation.

characterabilities.name: Alchemical Mask
characterabilities.description: This model does not suffer gas effects. When determining LOS or resolving attacks, this model ignores cloud effects and concealment granted from cloud effects.

characterabilities.name: Garrison Troops
characterabilities.description: This model can be included in an Ord or Llael army and are considered in faction.

characterabilities.name: Man-Sized
characterabilities.description: This model is treated as a small-based model and occupies the space from the bottom of its base to a height of 1.75”.

characterabilities.name: Mobile Artillery
characterabilities.description: When this model advances as part of its Normal Movement, it gains +1” movement for each Grunt in this unit within 2” of it at the start of its advance.

characterabilities.name: Take Up
characterabilities.description: If this model is destroyed, you can choose a trooper in this unit within 1” of it to be destroyed instead. Remove that trooper from the table instead of this model. This model has the same number of unmarked damage boxes as the chosen trooper.

ability.name: Arcing Fire
ability.description: When attacking with this weapon, this model can ignore intervening models except those within 1" of the target.

ability.name: Siege Weapon
ability.description: This weapon gains an additional die to its damage rolls against huge-based models and structures.

topability.name: Attack Type
topability.description: Each time this weapon is used to make an attack, choose one of the following special rules:

subabilities.name: Black Humor
subabilities.description: This weapon gains Continuous Effect: Corrosion and Grevious Wounds for this attack.

subabilities.name: Rust
subabilities.description: Construct models hit suffer -2 ARM for one turn.

subabilities.name: Withering Humor
subabilities.description: Living and undead models hit by this attack suffer -2 ARM and lose Tough for one turn unless they can ignore gas effects.

models.name: Grunt
models.title: Crucible Guard Alchemist Weapon Crew Unit

characterabilities.name: Alchemical Mask
characterabilities.description: This model does not suffer gas effects. When determining LOS or resolving attacks, this model ignores cloud effects and concealment granted from cloud effects.

characterabilities.name: Fast Reload (★Action)
characterabilities.description: While within 1” of this unit’s gunner, the gunner gains +1 ROF.

characterabilities.name: Berserk
characterabilities.description: When this model destroys one or more models with a melee attack during its Combat Action, immediately after the attack is resolved it must make one additional melee attack against another model in its melee range.

characterabilities.name: Chemical Imbalance
characterabilities.description: At the start of this unit's activation, choose two of the following stats: MAT, SPD, STR. This unit gains +2 to one chosen stat and +1 to the other chosen stat. You choose which stat receives which bonus. These bonuses last for one round.

characterabilities.name: Hyper-Regeneration
characterabilities.description: Remove d3 damage points from this model at the start of each of it's activations.

characterabilities.name: Impervious Flesh
characterabilities.description: When this model suffers a damage roll, roll one fewer die.

characterabilities.name: Alchemical Mask
characterabilities.description: This model does not suffer gas effects. When determining LOS or resolving attacks, this model ignores cloud effects and concealment granted from cloud effects.

characterabilities.name: Attached
characterabilities.description: Before the start of the game, attach this model to a friendly Faction leader for the rest of the game. Each Leader can have only one model/unit attached to it.

characterabilities.name: Transmogrification Elixir
characterabilities.description: This model can use Transmogrification Elixir once per game during your Control Phase. Immediately mark all of this model's damage boxes and replace it with Big Alyce.

characterabilities.name: Traumatic Transformation
characterabilities.description: This model begins the game as Little Alyce. When all of this model's damage boxes are marked, instead of becoming disabled this model is replaced with Big Alyce. Damage points in excess of this model's remaining unmarked damage boxes are not applied to Big Alyce's damage boxes. If this model is replaced with Big Alyce while advancing, it cannot continue to advance; if this model is replaced with Big Alyce during its activation, its activation ends. After this model is replaced with Big Alyce, apply effects that were on it to Big Alyce. When this model is replaced with Big Alyce, Big Alyce is not considered to have entered an area and does not trigger effects triggered from entering that area. Once this replacement is complet, any further damage is applied to Big Alyce's damage boxes.

topability.name: Magic Ability
topability.description: Performing a Magic Ability special action or special attack counts as casting a spell.

subabilities.name: Empower (★Action)
subabilities.description: RNG CMD. Target friendly Faction warjack. If the target warjack is in the range and it was suffering Disruption, it is no longer disrupted. The warjack also gains 1 focus point.

subabilities.name: Guidance (★Action)
subabilities.description: RNG CMD. Target friendly model. If the model is in range, it gains Eyeless Sight and it's weapons gain Damage Type: Arcane for one turn.

subabilities.name: Harmonious Exaltation (★Action)
subabilities.description: RNG CMD. Target this model’s leader. If it is in range, once this turn when the warlock casts a spell, reduce the COST of the spell by 1.

characterabilities.name: Alchemical Mask
characterabilities.description: This model does not suffer gas effects. When determining LOS or resolving attacks, this model ignores cloud effects and concealment granted from cloud effects.

characterabilities.name: Hyper-Regeneration
characterabilities.description: Remove d3 damage points from this model at the start of each of it's activations.

characterabilities.name: Jump
characterabilities.description: After it makes a full advance during its Normal Movement but before it performs its Combat Action, you can place this model anywhere completely within 5" of its current location. Any effects that prevent charging also prevent this model from using Jump.

characterabilities.name: Alchemical Mask
characterabilities.description: This model does not suffer gas effects. When determining LOS or resolving attacks, this model ignores cloud effects and concealment granted from cloud effects.

characterabilities.name: Command Attachment [Crucible Guard Infantry]
characterabilities.description: This attachment can be added to a Crucible Guard Infantry unit.

characterabilities.name: Garrison Troops
characterabilities.description: This model can be included in an Ord or Llael army and are considered in faction.

characterabilities.name: Guns Blazing
characterabilities.description: This model can use Guns Blazing once per game at any time while in formation during its unit’s activation. This activation, models in this unit can make one additional ranged attack during this unit’s Combat Action.

characterabilities.name: Tactics [Reposition [3"]]
characterabilities.description: Models in this unit gain Reposition 3". (At the end of an activation in which it did not run or fail a charge, a model with Reposition 3" can advance up to 3", then it's activation ends.)

topability.description: Each time this weapon is used to make an attack, choose one of the following special rules:

subabilities.name: Pyrocatalyst
subabilities.description: This attack causes fire damage. Models hit by this attack suffer the Fire continuous effect unless it has Resistance: Fire

characterabilities.description: This model does not suffer gas effects. When determining LOS or resolving attacks, this model ignores cloud effects and concealment granted from cloud effects.

characterabilities.name: Granted [Inspiration]
characterabilities.description: While this model is in play, models in its unit gain Inspiration. (A model with Inspiration gains +1 to attack accuracy rolls.)

characterabilities.name: Mage Static
characterabilities.description: While this model is in formation, enemy magic attacks targeting a model in it's unit suffer -5 RNG.

characterabilities.description: If this model is destroyed, you can choose a trooper in this unit within 1” of it to be destroyed instead. Remove that trooper from the table instead of this model. This model has the same number of unmarked damage boxes as the chosen trooper.

characterabilities.name: Command Attachment [Crucible Guard Rocketmen]
characterabilities.description: This attachment can be added to a Crucible Guard Rocketmen unit.

characterabilities.name: Death from Above
characterabilities.description: This model can use Death from Above once per game at any time during its activation. Models in this unit gain +2 to accuracy and damage rolls against enemy models without Flight. Death from Above lasts for one turn.

characterabilities.name: Flying High
characterabilities.description: Ranged attacks targeting this model with a RNG greater than 8 suffers -3 RNG to a minimum of 8. Friendly models can advance through this model if they have enough movement to move completely past its base. This model loses Flying High if it loses Flight.

characterabilities.name: Garrison Troops
characterabilities.description: This model can be included in an Ord or Llael army and are considered in faction.

characterabilities.description: While this model is in play, models in its unit gain Dodge. (A model with Dodge can advance up to 2" immediately after an enemy attack that missed it is resolved unless it was missed while advancing. It cannot be targeted by free strikes during this movement.)

characterabilities.name: Tactics [Sunblind 'em]
characterabilities.description: Models in this unit gain Sunblind 'em. (A model with Sunblind 'em gains +2 DEF from ranged and magic attacks.)

ability.name: Sky-Dropped
ability.description: Attacks with this weapon ignore cover. Models with Flight do not suffer blast damage from this attack.

characterabilities.description: This model does not suffer gas effects. When determining LOS or resolving attacks, this model ignores cloud effects and concealment granted from cloud effects.

characterabilities.name: Command Attachment [Small or Medium-based Mercenary unit]
characterabilities.description: This attachment can be added to a Small or Medium-based Mercenary unit unit.

characterabilities.name: Heal [d3+2] (★Action)
characterabilities.description: RNG 1". Target friendly living Faction model. If the model is in range remove d3+2 damage points from it.

characterabilities.name: Ranking Officer [Crucible Guard]
characterabilities.description: This model is a Ranking Officer. While this model is in play, models in its unit are Crucible Guard models instead of Mercenary models.

characterabilities.name: Revivifier
characterabilities.description: The model can use Revivifier one per game at any time during its activation. While in this model’s CMD range, friendly Faction warrior models gain Tough. Additionally, when a friendly Faction warrior model makes a Tough roll of 4, 5, or 6 while in this model’s CMD range, that model can remove 1 damage point. Revivifier lasts for one round.

topability.name: Field Alchemy
topability.description: This model can use one of the following special rules at any time during each of it's activations.

subabilities.name: Coagulum of Entropy
subabilities.description: RNG 5”.  Affected models gain Resistance: Corrosion. When an affected model is hit by a melee attack, the attacking model suffers the corrosion continuous effect. Coagulum of Enteroy

subabilities.name: Fortemorphic Elixir
subabilities.description: RNG 5”. Target friendly faction warrior model/unit. If the model/unit is in range, it gains +2 to its melee attack damage rolls and gains Overtake. Fortemorphic Elixir lasts for one round.

subabilities.name: The Good Stuff
subabilities.description: RNG 5”. Target friendly faction warrior model/unit. If the model/unit is in range, it gains Tough and cannot become knocked down but suffers -1 to accuracy rolls. The Good Stuff lasts for one round.

ability.name: Anesthesia
ability.description: A living model damaged by an attack with this weapon becomes stationary for one round.

ability.name: Puncture
ability.description: On a direct hit, all models hit automatically suffer 1 damage point.

characterabilities.name: 'Jack Hunter
characterabilities.description: This model gains an additional die on its melee and ranged damage rolls against warjacks.

characterabilities.description: This model does not suffer gas effects. When determining LOS or resolving attacks, this model ignores cloud effects and concealment granted from cloud effects.

characterabilities.name: Flying High
characterabilities.description: Ranged attacks targeting this model with a RNG greater than 8 suffers -3 RNG to a minimum of 8. Friendly models can advance through this model if they have enough movement to move completely past its base. This model loses Flying High if it loses Flight.

characterabilities.description: This attachment can be added to a Crucible Guard Rocketmen unit.

ability.name: Cumbersome
ability.description: This model cannot make initial attacks with this weapon and another weapon on the same activation

ability.name: Sky-Dropped
ability.description: Attacks with this weapon ignore cover. Models with Flight do not suffer blast damage from this attack.

characterabilities.name: Bulldoze
characterabilities.description: When this model is B2B with an enemy model during it's Normal Movement, it can push that model up to 2" directly away from it. A model can be pushed by Bulldoze only once per turn. Bulldoze has no effect when this model makes a trample power attack.

characterabilities.name: Exhaust Fumes
characterabilities.description: When this model advances during it's Normal Movement, for one round other friendly models gain concealment while within 3" of this model.

characterabilities.name: Reposition [3"]
characterabilities.description: At the end of an activation in which it did not run or fail a charge, this model can advance up to 3", then it's activation ends.

ability.name: Ram
ability.description: When an enemy model is hit by this weapon during this model's Combat Action, it becomes knocked down and can be pushed 1" directly away from this model. If the model hit is pushed, this model can immediately advance 1" directly toward it.
